dishes.name: Fried Chicken
dishes.shortDescription: Crispy buttermilk fried chicken with seasoned crust.
dishes.pairingNotes: The fat and salt of fried chicken are cut nicely by sparkling sake's bubbles or a dry, umami-rich Junmai.

dishes.name: Shrimp and Grits
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy grits topped with sautéed shrimp and savory gravy.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai Ginjo's aromatics lift the seafood while Junmai's umami echoes the rich, savory gravy.

dishes.name: Baked Mac and Cheese
dishes.shortDescription: Oven-baked macaroni in a rich cheese sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: A fuller-bodied Junmai stands up to the cheese, while a lightly sweet Nigori contrasts the saltiness.

dishes.name: Collard Greens
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked greens with smoked ham hock and aromatics.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami matches the smoked meat and earthiness of greens; Honjozo provides brightness.

dishes.name: Chicken and Dumplings
dishes.shortDescription: Tender chicken in creamy broth with fluffy dumplings.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo's aromatic notes lift the creamy broth; Honjozo provides clean, refreshing contrast.

dishes.name: Gumbo
dishes.shortDescription: Thick stew with roux, okra, and sausage or seafood.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai complements the deep umami; Nigori can soothe any spice.

dishes.name: Cornbread
dishes.shortDescription: Golden-brown corn cake, slightly sweet and buttery.
dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori's sweetness echoes the cornbread; sparkling sake cuts through the butter.

dishes.name: Po'boy Sandwich
dishes.shortDescription: Fried seafood or roast beef on French bread with dressed greens.
dishes.pairingNotes: Sparkling sake cuts the fried coating; Honjozo balances the tart remoulade.

dishes.name: Margherita Pizza
dishes.shortDescription: Thin crust pizza with tomato, mozzarella and basil.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai Ginjo's fruitiness works like a light white wine with tomato and basil.

dishes.name: Pasta Carbonara
dishes.shortDescription: Spaghetti with egg, cheese, pancetta and black pepper.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches umami and richness; Ginjo adds lift.

dishes.name: Mushroom Risotto
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy rice cooked with stock, mushrooms and parmesan.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai brings earthy umami; Junmai Daiginjo adds polish.

dishes.name: Lasagna Bolognese
dishes.shortDescription: Layered pasta with meat ragù and béchamel.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami matches the slow-cooked ragù; Honjozo adds brightness.

dishes.name: Osso Buco
dishes.shortDescription: Braised veal shanks in tomato and wine.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai complements the rich braised meat; Ginjo adds aromatic contrast.

dishes.name: Cacio e Pepe
dishes.shortDescription: Spaghetti with cheese and black pepper only.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches the umami depth; Honjozo cuts through the pepper and cheese.

dishes.name: Pappardelle with Wild Boar
dishes.shortDescription: Wide ribbon pasta with wild boar ragù.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami handles the gamey meat; Ginjo offers floral notes for balance.

dishes.name: Burrata and Heirloom Tomato
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy burrata with ripe tomatoes and basil.
dishes.pairingNotes: Delicate Ginjo or Daiginjo highlight the burrata's cream and tomato freshness.

dishes.name: Saltimbocca
dishes.shortDescription: Veal wrapped with prosciutto and sage.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo's aromatics match the sage; Honjozo balances salt and richness.

dishes.name: Coq au Vin
dishes.shortDescription: Chicken braised in red wine with mushrooms and bacon.
dishes.pairingNotes: Robust Junmai handles braised flavors; Honjozo keeps finish clean.

dishes.name: Bouillabaisse
dishes.shortDescription: Provençal fish stew with saffron and herbs.
dishes.pairingNotes: Aromatic Ginjo styles balance saffron and seafood.

dishes.name: Duck Confit
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked duck leg preserved in its own fat.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami handles richness; Ginjo cuts through fat.

dishes.name: Beef Bourguignon
dishes.shortDescription: Beef braised in red wine with pearl onions and mushrooms.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai stands up to the wine and meat; Honjozo provides balance.

dishes.name: Sole Meunière
dishes.shortDescription: Pan-fried sole with browned butter and lemon.
dishes.pairingNotes: Elegant Daiginjo highlights the delicate fish and butter nuance.

dishes.name: Coquilles St. Jacques
dishes.shortDescription: Scallops in creamy sauce gratinéed with breadcrumbs.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo complements creamy sauce and sweet scallops perfectly.

dishes.name: French Onion Soup
dishes.shortDescription: Caramelized onions in beef stock with cheesy bread.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches the umami depth; Honjozo cuts through cheese.

dishes.name: Cassoulet
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked beans with duck and sausage.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami complements the rich, slow-cooked flavors.

dishes.name: Cheeseburger
dishes.shortDescription: Grilled beef patty with cheese on a bun.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai supports beef and cheese; sparkling sake cuts fat.

dishes.name: New England Clam Chowder
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy soup with clams, potatoes and bacon.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai Ginjo enhances clam sweetness.

dishes.name: NY Strip Steak
dishes.shortDescription: Grilled prime beef steak with char.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami echoes the beef; Daiginjo refines the pairing.

dishes.name: Lobster Roll
dishes.shortDescription: Fresh lobster meat on toasted bun with mayo.
dishes.pairingNotes: Delicate Ginjo/Daiginjo highlight lobster sweetness.

dishes.name: Mac and Cheese
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy pasta with aged cheeses.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai stands up to cheese richness.

dishes.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked pork on bun with coleslaw.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai balances smoke and sauce; Nigori softens spice.

dishes.name: Buffalo Wings
dishes.shortDescription: Fried chicken wings in spicy hot sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori's sweetness soothes heat; sparkling cuts fat.

dishes.name: Crab Cakes
dishes.shortDescription: Pan-fried lumpy crab cakes with Old Bay seasoning.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo enhances crab sweetness; Honjozo keeps finish light.

dishes.name: Smoked Brisket
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-smoked beef brisket with bark and smoke ring.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai stands up to smoke and fat.

dishes.name: Pulled Pork
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked pork shoulder shredded and sauced.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai balances sweetness and tang.

dishes.name: BBQ Pork Ribs
dishes.shortDescription: Smoked or grilled pork ribs with sticky glaze.
dishes.pairingNotes: Rich ribs take fuller Junmai or Nigori.

dishes.name: BBQ Chicken
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-smoked chicken with sweet and spicy sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai complements smoke; Nigori softens sweetness.

dishes.name: Burnt Ends
dishes.shortDescription: Caramelized brisket point cubes with bark.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches umami; Nigori suits the caramelized sweetness.

dishes.name: Texas Smoked Sausage
dishes.shortDescription: Whole smoked sausage with heavy smoke.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami echoes the meat; Honjozo provides balance.

dishes.name: Smoked Turkey Breast
dishes.shortDescription: Whole smoked turkey breast with smoke ring.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo adds delicacy to lean meat; Honjozo keeps it clean.

dishes.name: Grilled Vegetable Platter
dishes.shortDescription: Assorted seasonal vegetables grilled with olive oil and herbs.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo's aromatics work with sweet vegetables.

dishes.name: Tofu Stir-Fry
dishes.shortDescription: Stir-fried tofu with mixed vegetables in soy-based sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: Soy-based sauces echo umami in Junmai.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.shortDescription: Tomato, mozzarella, basil with balsamic reduction.
dishes.pairingNotes: Delicate Ginjo/Daiginjo highlight tomato and mozzarella.

dishes.name: Vegetable Tempura
dishes.shortDescription: Light-battered fried vegetables with dipping sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo or sparkling sake pairs beautifully with fried delicacy.

dishes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.shortDescription: Breaded fried eggplant layered with sauce and cheese.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches tomato and cheese richness.

dishes.name: Vegetable Quiche
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy egg tart with seasonal vegetables.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo adds elegance; Honjozo keeps it fresh.

dishes.name: Chickpea Curry
dishes.shortDescription: Spiced chickpea stew in coconut milk.
dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori's sweetness soothes spice; Junmai adds depth.

dishes.name: Mushroom Risotto
dishes.shortDescription: Creamy rice with wild mushrooms.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami complements earthy mushrooms.

dishes.name: Fresh Oysters
dishes.shortDescription: Raw oysters on the half shell with lemon.
dishes.pairingNotes: Clean Daiginjo/Ginjo emphasize salinity and sweetness.

dishes.name: Seared Scallops
dishes.shortDescription: Pan-seared scallops with browned butter.
dishes.pairingNotes: Elegant Junmai Daiginjo pairs beautifully with scallops.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon
dishes.shortDescription: Salmon fillet grilled with herbs and lemon.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo highlights herbaceous notes; Honjozo balances richness.

dishes.name: Butter-Poached Lobster Tail
dishes.shortDescription: Tender lobster poached in butter.

dishes.name: Shrimp Scampi
dishes.shortDescription: Garlic butter shrimp over pasta.

dishes.name: Fish Ceviche
dishes.shortDescription: Raw fish cured in citrus juice with vegetables.
dishes.pairingNotes: Daiginjo's elegance suits the delicate ceviche; sparkling cuts citrus.

dishes.name: Fish and Chips
dishes.shortDescription: Battered fried fish with fries.
dishes.pairingNotes: Sparkling sake cuts fat; Honjozo keeps it fresh.

dishes.name: Mussels in White Wine
dishes.shortDescription: Steamed mussels in white wine and herbs.

dishes.name: Bulgogi

dishes.name: Kimchi Jjigae

dishes.name: Bibimbap

dishes.name: Korean BBQ Beef
dishes.shortDescription: Thinly sliced beef grilled at the table.

dishes.name: Soft Tofu Stew

dishes.name: Korean Fried Chicken

dishes.name: Japchae

dishes.name: Pap and Relish

dishes.name: Suya
dishes.shortDescription: Spiced grilled meat skewers.
dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori softens the spice; Junmai handles the nutty spice.

dishes.name: Okra Soup
dishes.shortDescription: Slimy okra-based soup with meat.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches the umami; Honjozo adds balance.

dishes.name: Fish and Chips
dishes.shortDescription: Beer-battered fried fish with fries.
dishes.pairingNotes: Sparkling sake mimics beer's refreshing quality.

dishes.name: Shepherd's Pie
dishes.shortDescription: Baked minced lamb with vegetables topped with mashed potatoes.
dishes.pairingNotes: Savory Junmai matches hearty filling.

dishes.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
dishes.shortDescription: Warm sponge cake with toffee sauce.
dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori's sweetness mirrors the pudding.

dishes.name: Beef and Ale Pie
dishes.shortDescription: Slow-cooked beef in ale gravy with pastry crust.
dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai complements the ale and beef.

dishes.name: Sunday Roast

dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai's umami echoes the roasted meat.

dishes.name: Cornish Pasty

dishes.name: Cottage Pie

dishes.name: Beans on Toast
dishes.shortDescription: Baked beans on buttered white bread.
dishes.pairingNotes: Light Honjozo or sparkling sake suits this simple dish.

dishes.shortDescription: Rice dish with saffron, seafood and vegetables.
dishes.pairingNotes: Ginjo/Daiginjo balance saffron fragrance and briny seafood.

dishes.name: Gambas al Ajillo

dishes.pairingNotes: Aromatic Ginjo works well with garlic and shrimp.

dishes.name: Gazpacho

dishes.name: Chorizo Piquante

dishes.name: Pan con Tomate

dishes.pairingNotes: Sparkling adds brightness; Ginjo complements tomato freshness.

dishes.name: Croquetas

dishes.pairingNotes: Sparkling cuts fat; Honjozo keeps it light.

dishes.name: Tortilla Española

dishes.name: Pulpo a la Gallega

dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches the roasted pepper and cheese.

dishes.name: Chile con Carne

dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori softens spice; Junmai handles the savory depth.

dishes.name: Street Tacos

dishes.pairingNotes: Junmai matches the grilled meat; sparkling refreshes.

dishes.name: Jerk Chicken

dishes.pairingNotes: Nigori's sweetness calms intense heat.

dishes.shortDescription: National dish of Jamaica with sautéed salted cod and ackee.
